actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to prohibit the interstate shipment of a human body for the purpose of cremation unless a medical examiner or licensed physician has certified that the body does not contain a medical implant containing a battery or power cell.

summary.text: Prohibits the interstate shipment of a human body for the purpose of cremation unless it is certified that such body does not contain a medical implant with a battery or power cell.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the interstate shipment of a human body for the purpose of cremation unless a medical examiner or licensed physician has certified that the body does not contain a medical implant containing a battery or power cell.
